short_summary: This tender specification cites the need for delivery and installation of dental equipment in United Kingdom within a certain timeframe. The Contract will be for a period of one year
description: This tender documents the collaborative process between the Department of National Defence (DND) and Royal Canadian Dental Corps (RCDC) for the procurement of dental equipment and installation, as well as providing related training. The desired result will be achieved through effective communication and regular project meetings between the DND and the contractor. The tender seeks all-qualified sellers for this opportunity to fill the contract specification and description
